title: Universal Design for Learning (UDL)-Based Surgical Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Terminology and Understanding of Surgical Procedures
context.additional_context: Post-COVID-19, there is a need for flexible instructional design to adapt to non-face-to-face education environments and meet diverse learning needs.

learning_goals: Learners can explain basic surgical skills step-by-step using provided video and text materials via smartphones.
Learners can successfully perform emergency response procedures three or more times through simulation-based quizzes.
Learners can exchange constructive feedback at least twice with peers on surgical case analyses via online discussion boards.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
